scenes.description: The sun rises over Manhattan's towering skyscrapers as the city awakens.
Peter Parker jolts awake to his phone alarm. He accidentally sticks his cracked phone to his palm.
Peter makes coffee with enhanced agility, catches a falling mug. Aunt May enters. Peter's spider-sense tingles before a massive explosion rocks the building.

dialogues.line: Morning, sleepyhead. You're going to be late for your interview at the Bugle.
Right! The interview. I completely forgot—
Actually, Aunt May, I might need to—
Probably just construction. I'll... check it out.

scenes.description: Black smoke billows from a high-tech laboratory. Civilians run screaming as mechanical tentacles smash through windows, revealing Dr. Otto Octavius.

SCENE 3
INT. PETER PARKER'S APARTMENT - KITCHEN - MORNING
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 5

Description:
Peter makes coffee with enhanced agility, catches a falling mug. Aunt May enters. Peter's spider-sense tingles before a massive explosion rocks the building.

Main Characters: PETER PARKER, AUNT MAY

Technical Cues:
  - enhanced agility
  - spider-sense TINGLES
  - massive EXPLOSION
  - Car alarms blare

Department Notes:

Dialogue:
PETER
    "Focus, Parker. Be normal."

AUNT MAY
    "Morning, sleepyhead. You're going to be late for your interview at the Bugle."

PETER
    "Right! The interview. I completely forgot—"

PETER (distracted)
    "Actually, Aunt May, I might need to—"

AUNT MAY
    "What was that?"

PETER
    "Probably just construction. I'll... check it out."
